import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; import Table from 'react-bootstrap/Table'; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import React, {useContext} from 'react' import Context from '../Context' import Footer from '../componentes/Footer' import NavBar from "../componentes/NavBar" const Carrito = () => { const {agregarCar, incrementar, decrement} = useContext (Context); const Navigate = useNavigate (); const total = agregarCar.reduce((a, {count, price}) => a + price*count, 0); return ( <>
Detalles del pedido
{agregarCar.map((producto, i) => ( ))}
Nombre del producto
Precio
Cantidad
SubTotal
{producto.name} ${(producto.price).toLocaleString("es-Cl")} {producto.count} ${(producto.price*producto.count).toLocaleString("es-Cl")}

Total: ${total.toLocaleString("es-Cl")}

) } export default Carrito
